text: Table | Contraindications to pancreas transplantation Absolute Untreatable coronary disease Irreversible pulmonary and hepatic dysfunction Recent myocardial infarction or poor left ventricular function Active infection Malignancy in last 3 yr Positive HIV serology, hepatitis B Substance abuse or severe psychiatric illness Relative Age >55yr Recent retinal haemorrhage Symptomatic cerebrovascular or peripheral vascular disease BMI >30 kg m â„¢2 Smoking Severe aorto-iliac disease
